PaymentAuthorizationReversal.description: An authorization reversal alerts the issuer that part or all of a sale has been cancelled and the authorization hold should be rescinded

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

name.description: Short description of the payment authorization reversal entry

paymentAuthorizationReversalStatus.description: Processing stage of the payment authorization reversal

paymentAuthorizationProcessingMode.description: Describes whether the payment processing was done by the platform or by an external system

authorizationReversalAmount.description: Amount that was previously authorized and is now being reversed

paymentAuthorizationId.description: References the original payment authorization that is being reversed

capturePaymentId.description: References the capture payment the refund allocation applies to

customerEmailAddress.description: Email address that is used in the authorization/reversal process

customerPhoneNumber.description: Phone number that is used in the authorization/reversal process

gatewayRequestDateTime.description: Date and time when the payment platform sent the authorization request to the gateway

paymentGatewayDateTime.description: Datetime provided by the gateway after successful communication

paymentGatewayReferenceNumber.description: Unique transaction identifier generated by payment gateway

paymentGatewayResultCode.description: Result code returned by the gateway

paymentGatewayInternalReferenceNumber.description: Unique transaction identifier generated by the internal payment platform

paymentGatewayInternalResultCode.description: Internal result code returned by the internal payment platform

ipAddress.description: Unique network address of the device that originated the payment authorization request

macAddress.description: Unique hardware identification number of the device that originated the payment authorization request

commentText.description: Descriptive text about the payment authorization reversal

externalCreatedDate.description: Preserves original creation date for payments imported from external systems

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted
